channel.title: gtd on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in gtd on Barefoot Rob

item.title: complice staleness
item.description: 12:53 Sunday 13 May 2018 JST I wrote this: I have been using Complice for a while and I am at a stage where I am reminded to do a few things that I might not have remembered, but I am not excited to craft my things to do. I think part of the problem is I have a bunch of stuff coming in from Workflowy, which includes little reminders (wear a belt, which I sometimes forget) and (do not eat after 9pm, which I sometimes ignore)

item.title: Things to do soon
item.description: 19:26 Wednesday 04 February 2015 JST walk home with Lin write to JB list of students’ names process recent emails ask Nate about CB tickets make maze for book write Fiverr card send Fiverr card write plans for 18 Feb class evaluate Pelican for static site submit medical receipts to insurance call Soness look at AB tickets move all www.robnugen.com content to static site move ridiculous wiki stuff to static site

item.title: Do today
item.description: ##09:08 Friday 23 January 2015 JST## take picture of Alex rename iPhone 4 pics of Japanese games load all Japanese games on iPad Take iPad screenshots of Japanese games upload them all to Dropbox mail Tariq Post picture of Alex post pictures of my robot suit Finish Stanley maze submit stanley maze take food-gift to JB for covering my lesson set up new AB DB server get AB server talking to DB server Document AB process copy data to DB server try to get camera to follow ball in unity (while data copies) turn off AB servers when done select a pic for /r/whereisthisplace find it on map keep answer somewhere handy post it
